objects.text:
• 9 Pieces Including 2 Cats
• Spinning Palm Tree
• Adjustable Leaf Bed
• Relaxing Hammock

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This banner features a playful, vibrant layout divided into four quadrants with pastel background blocks in pink, blue, coral, and aqua. The top left quadrant introduces the product with a bold title using id `heading` and a subheading using `subheading`, both in prominent purple tones. A catchy tagline is placed below them, referenced by id `tagline`, in a vivid pink font. The top right contains the product display (id `product_image`) that adds a fun and imaginative theme with kittens and toys. The lower left quadrant highlights key features using the `description` text block in navy blue. Beneath it, the price is marked with id `price` in bold coral-red, followed by a pink call-to-action button `cta_button` with white text `cta`. Circular and wave decorations add depth and playfulness across the banner.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink (#FFE6F2)
- Coral Pink (#FF9EB5)
- Sky Blue (#87CEEB)
- Aqua Blue (#A0E7E5)
- Purple (#9C27B0)
- Hot Pink (#FF4081)
- Deep Blue (#311B92)
- Red Coral (#FF5252)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a vibrant, playful color palette ideal for a children's advertisement banner. Key colors include hot pink (#F94FA1) for the top hut, showcasing energy and fun, and bright teal green (#3AC69B) for the grass and leaves, giving a natural, lively feel. Warm sand beige (#F3C295) is used for the base and pillars, providing a neutral contrast. Other accents include lavender (#D09BE9), sky blue (#66C7E7), soft brown (#B66B34), and an attention-grabbing red-pink (#EF2F6D) for toys. The colors are well-blended across components, yet bold sections like the pink hut and green canopy draw focus, enhancing visibility and cheerful appeal.
